quote: He is Romeo, and he is heartbroken. Every word is wistful. When he says, 'O, teach me how I should forget to think!' I, for the first time, see what the big deal is about Shakespeare.
quote_letters: HE IS ROMEO AND HE IS HEARTBROKEN EVERY WORD IS WISTFUL WHEN HE SAYS O TEACH ME HOW I SHOULD FORGET TO THINK I FOR THE FIRST TIME SEE WHAT THE BIG DEAL IS ABOUT SHAKESPEARE
